projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Here is a selection of projects that illustrate my skills and interest in AI and development.

project_list.title: Paiya.ia
project_list.desc: Development of a personal AI assistant, focused on natural language processing and task automation.

project_list.title: langchain-chainlit
project_list.desc: A conversational AI application using LangChain and Chainlit to create intelligent chat interfaces.

project_list.title: Spam-Klassifizierung
project_list.desc: Email classification (spam/ham) with Scikit-learn, a classic in Machine Learning.

project_list.title: Sensorprobe
project_list.desc: Analysis and visualization of sensor data, a key step before ML modeling.

project_list.title: luciabot
project_list.desc: A simple chatbot, an exploration project of conversational interfaces.
